name: Palmer, Cabin Canyon, and Strausenback Trail Loop
description: Enjoy this 4.0-mile loop trail near Manitou Springs, Colorado. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 1 h 46 min to complete.

name: Red Rocks Trading Post Trail
description: Check out this 1.6-mile loop trail near Morrison, Colorado. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 50 min to complete.

name: Columbine Trail
description: Try this 8.0-mile out-and-back trail near Colorado Springs, Colorado. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 4 h 4 min to complete.
